titleStmt.title: A dialogue between R---- and F----, concerning a discourse entitul'd, The view of an ecclesiastick in his socks and buskins: or, a just reprimand given to Mr. Alsop. Wherein is discover'd, an unheard-of discord between the author and himself. / By a friend to the cause of Mr. Lobb, the worth of Mr. Williams, and the persons of both.
titleStmt.author: Young, Samuel, fl. 1684-1700.

titleStmt.title: A dialogue between R---- and F----, concerning a discourse entitul'd, The view of an ecclesiastick in his socks and buskins: or, a just reprimand given to Mr. Alsop. Wherein is discover'd, an unheard-of discord between the author and himself. / By a friend to the cause of Mr. Lobb, the worth of Mr. Williams, and the persons of both.
titleStmt.author: Young, Samuel, fl. 1684-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Marshal, at the Bible in Gracechurch-street,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Samuel Young by Wing.
Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
